Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.Description: The name of the device vendor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.Description: The name of the device model.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: Additional info from manufacturer about this device.
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that provides additional information from the vendor about the camera.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSensorType
Enumeration.Description: This feature specifies the type of the sensor.

Integer.Name: ReadOutTime
Integer.Description: Readout time in ms for current format settings.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSensorClockFrequency
Enumeration.Description: Control sensor speed.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceClockSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the clock frequency to access from the device.

Float.Name: DeviceClockFrequency
Float.Description: Returns the frequency in Hertz of the selected Clock.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.

Enumeration.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Enumeration.Description: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.

Enumeration.Name: PartialScanEnabled
Enumeration.Description: On/Off Switch for partial scan readout.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.Description: Acquisition and Trigger Controls lists all features that relate to actual image acquisition, including the triggering mode.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.Description: Enables the acquisition at the framerate specified by AcquisitionFrameRate.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the source for the trigger (input line signal, software, ...).

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type of signal change that will activate the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.

Enumeration.Name: ReadoutMode
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.Description: Digital I/O describes the features required to control the general input and output pins of the camera.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.Description: Controls the invertion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.Description: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Float.Name: LineDebouncerHighTimeAbs
Float.Description: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from low to high

Float.Name: LineDebouncerLowTimeAbs
Float.Description: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from high to low

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.Description: Source signal for the Output Line.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Integer.Name: UserOutputValueAll
Integer.Description: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.

Category.Name: CounterAndTimerControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.

Integer.Name: FrameCounter
Integer.Description: Sets the frame counter, which is part of the Baumer image header.

Enumeration.Name: TimerSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Timer to configure.

Float.Name: TimerDuration
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.

Float.Name: TimerDelay
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before to start the Timer.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerSource
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerActivation
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer.

Enumeration.Name: CounterSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which counter to configure.

Enumeration.Name: CounterEventSource
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source to start the counter.

Enumeration.Name: CounterEventActivation
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the counter.

Integer.Name: CounterValue
Integer.Description: Reads or writes the current value of the selected counter.

Integer.Name: CounterValueAtReset
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the selected counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.

Command.Name: CounterReset
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected counter and starts it.

Enumeration.Name: CounterResetSource
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the counter.

Enumeration.Name: CounterResetActivation
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Activation mode of the Counter Reset Source signal.

Integer.Name: CounterDuration
Integer.Description: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.

Enumeration.Name: CounterStatus
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current state of the counter.

Category.Name: EventControl
Category.Description: Category that contains Event control features.

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.

Enumeration.Name: EventNotification
Enumeration.Description: Notification type issued when event occurs.

Integer.Name: LostEventCounter
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: DiscardedEventCounter
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated. It controls the analog black level as a raw integer value.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.

Command.Name: WhiteBalance
Command.Description: AutoWhiteBalance - OnePush is self-clearing to Manual.

Enumeration.Name: BrightnessCorrection
Enumeration.Description: On/Off Switch for the Brightness Correction (only available for binning)

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.Description: Category that includes the LUT control features.

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which LUT to control.

Boolean.Name: LUTEnable
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.

Boolean.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
Boolean.Description: Enable the correction of defect pixels.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelListIndex
Integer.Description: Index to the pixel correction list

Boolean.Name: DefectPixelListEntryActive
Boolean.Description: Determines if the pixel correction is active for the selected entry.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelListEntryPosX
Integer.Description: X position of the pixel.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelListEntryPosY
Integer.Description: Y position of the pixel.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.Description: Endianess of the device registers.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.Description: Selects which physical network interface to control.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.Description: MAC address of the network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. This feature indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. This feature indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. This feature indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevCurrentIPConfiguration
Enumeration.Description: This feature is deprecated.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.Description: Indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.Description: Indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.Description: Indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.Description: Provides the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.Description: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.Description: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsUserDefinedName
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. User-defined name register is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsSerialNumber
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. Serial number register is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENTDATA
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENT
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsPACKETRESEND
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsWRITEMEM
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsConcatenation
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated. Multiple operations in a single message are supported.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.Description: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz).

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.Description: Latches current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPPendingAck
Boolean.Description: Enables generation of PENDING_ACK.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPHeartbeatDisable
Boolean.Description: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.

Integer.Name: GevGVCPPendingTimeout
Integer.Description: Indicates the longest GVCP command execution time before a device returns a PENDING_ACK.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSocket
Integer.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationIPAddress
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.Description: Index of network interface to use (from 0 to 3).

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.Description: When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.Description: Can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.Description: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCFTD
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevIPConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.Description: This feature reports the current IP configuration status.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features changes during acquisition.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefaultSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkSelector
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the chunk to configure. Once a chunk has been selected, all changes to the chunk settings will be applied to the selected chunk.

Boolean.Name: ChunkEnable
Boolean.Description: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Register.Name: ChunkImage
Register.Description: Returns the entire image data included in the payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkOffsetX
Integer.Description: Returns the OffsetX of the image included in the payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkOffsetY
Integer.Description: Returns the OffsetY of the image included in the payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkWidth
Integer.Description: Returns the Width of the image included in the payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkHeight
Integer.Description: Returns the Height of the image included in the payload.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkPixelFormat
Enumeration.Description: Returns the Pixelformat of the image included in the payload.

Float.Name: ChunkExposureTime
Float.Description: Returns the exposure time used to capture the image.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkBlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level to retrieve data from.

Float.Name: ChunkBlackLevel
Float.Description: Returns the black level used to capture the image included in the payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkFrameID
Integer.Description: Returns the unique Identifier of the frame (or image) included in the payload.

Category.Name: ActionControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Action control features.

Integer.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Integer.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.

Integer.Name: ActionSelector
Integer.Description: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupMask
Integer.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupKey
Integer.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Boolean.Name: HDREnable
Boolean.Description: Enables the 'High Dynamic Range' mode.

Integer.Name: HDRIndex
Integer.Description: Index of HDR element to access.

Category.Name: BoSequencerControl
Category.Description: BoSequencer describes the features required to control the acquisition of a user defined sequence.

Enumeration.Name: BoSequencerEnable
Enumeration.Description: Enable or disable the sequencer for special multi-frame mode. Normal acquisition will be stopped.

Enumeration.Name: BoSequencerStart
Enumeration.Description: Starts the configured sequence if enabled.

Boolean.Name: BoSequencerIsRunning
Boolean.Description: This feature is used to check if the sequencer is running.

Enumeration.Name: BoSequencerMode
Enumeration.Description: Specify the running mode of the sequencer.

Integer.Name: BoSequencerSetNumberOfSets
Integer.Description: Set the number of sets to configure.

Integer.Name: BoSequencerSetSelector
Integer.Description: Select the sets to configure.

Integer.Name: BoSequencerLoops
Integer.Description: Number of Loops for the parameter sets.

Integer.Name: BoSequencerSetRepeats
Integer.Description: Number of repeats of a single parameter set.

Integer.Name: BoSequencerFramesPerTrigger
Integer.Description: Number of frames per trigger.

Enumeration.Name: BoSequencerIOSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the sequencer output lines.

Boolean.Name: BoSequencerIOStatus
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of all available Sequencer outputs.

Integer.Name: GenICamFeatureIsLocked
Integer.Description: Sets the Locked state.

Port.Name: Device
Port.Description: All access to the Camera is realized via the GigE Port
